table.name: civicrm_mailing_group
table.comment: Stores information about the groups that participate in this mailing..

field.name: mailing_id
field.comment: The ID of a previous mailing to include/exclude recipients.

field.name: group_type
field.comment: Are the members of the group included or excluded?.

field.name: entity_table
field.comment: Name of table where item being referenced is stored.

field.name: entity_id
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: search_id
field.comment: The filtering search. custom search id or -1 for civicrm api search

field.name: search_args
field.comment: The arguments to be sent to the search function
